question: What is the name of India’s lightest level III plus bulletproof jacket that was developed by the Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC)?
explanation: The name of India’s lightest level III plus bulletproof jacket that was developed by the Bhabha Atomic Research Centre (BARC) is Bhava Kavach. The weight of the jacket is 6.8 kg. It is recently inducted in the Central Industrial Security Force camp, Trombay. The headquarter of BARC is located in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
